data.title: Business Analyst (CSPO) at Garmin Cluj SRL
data.meta_description: Business Analyst (CSPO) at Garmin Cluj SRL - Cluj County, Romania, RO
data.text:
• Demonstrating advanced understanding of business analysis principles/methodologies; applying and adapting them into requirements

• Work closely with project team, including multiple stakeholders to ensure requirements are understood and deliverables are aligned with long-term business objectives

• Work with business stakeholders to determine application roadmap

• Manage development and documentation of requirements from multiple stakeholders using scenarios, use cases, and business workflow analyses

• Identify inter-dependencies between projects and overall business strategies

• Collaborate directly with co-located and remote development team members

• Collaborate with QA team to define test cases and assist with testing efforts

• Manage acceptance testing by end users to ensure appropriate standards are met and successful deployment validation is completed

• Leading Backlog Refinement Sessions (grooming)

• Defining stories: includes Description, Definition of Done, Success Criteria, Testing Scenarios

• Leading Sprint Planning Sessions

• Sprint Review (Retrospective) – attending to see what works for team and how they feel about how things are going.

• Release Planning – working with stakeholders and developers to determine which stories are ready to go to production and the timeline to get the tagged code migrated through all environments

Main activities and responsibilities previous positions:

Test execution on different internal projects base on: WinCE; WinMobile; Android; Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8; OS X.6; Windows Phone 7; Windows Phone 8; WinCE 7.0 Automotive Embedded

• Bug reporting

• Test reporting to PM

• Test cases and improvement for testing techniques

• Test planning for a team of 1-2 testers

• Test validation plan for Automotive customers

• Test driving

Technical skills and competences

• XML logistics

• Batch scripting under DOS (beginner)

• BASH scripting under UNIX (beginner)

• GIS knowledge

• API internal logistics

•Working with databases

• Automotive CAN and OBD II understanding

• IEEE829-98 standard understanding for validation and test reporting
